questions.answer: The National College of Science and Technology (NCST) is a private educational institution in Dasmariñas, Cavite, Philippines. It offers programs in engineering, information technology, business, health sciences, and various technical-vocational courses.
NCST is located at Aguinaldo Highway, Dasmariñas, Cavite, Philippines.
The National College of Science and Technology was founded in 1998 in Dasmariñas, Cavite.

patterns: what is the vision of ncst
questions.answer: The vision of NCST is to be recognized as one of the leading institutions in providing globally competitive education in science, technology, and business.

patterns: what is the mission of ncst
questions.answer: NCST’s mission is to produce competent, innovative, and morally upright professionals who contribute to national development through science, technology, and business education.

NCST offers various courses in Engineering (Computer, Electronics, Electrical, Mechanical, Civil), Information Technology (BSIT, Computer Science), Business (Accountancy, Business Administration), Health Sciences (Nursing, Pharmacy, Medical Technology), and Technical-Vocational programs.
Yes, NCST offers computer-related programs including Bachelor of Science in Information Technology (BSIT), BS in Computer Science, and BS in Computer Engineering.
Yes, NCST offers Engineering programs including Computer Engineering, Electronics Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, and Civil Engineering.

patterns: is there health sciences in ncst
questions.answer: Yes, NCST offers health-related courses including Nursing, Pharmacy, and Medical Technology.
Yes, NCST offers business-related programs such as Accountancy, Business Administration, Marketing Management, and Entrepreneurship.
NCST has modern facilities including computer laboratories, engineering workshops, libraries, science laboratories, multimedia classrooms, study lounges, a gymnasium, and student activity centers.
Yes, NCST has a well-equipped library that provides books, journals, e-resources, and research materials for students and faculty.
Yes, NCST has laboratories for Computer Science, Engineering, Chemistry, Physics, and Health Sciences.
Yes, NCST provides internet access and Wi-Fi hotspots in designated areas of the campus.

patterns: what student services does ncst offer
questions.answer: NCST provides student services such as guidance and counseling, registrar services, scholarships and financial aid, medical and dental services, and career development support.
Yes, NCST offers various scholarships and financial assistance programs for qualified students.

patterns: does ncst have a guidance office
questions.answer: Yes, NCST has a Guidance and Counseling Office that provides academic, personal, and career guidance to students.
Yes, NCST has different student organizations and clubs for academics, sports, arts, and leadership development.

patterns: what are the admission requirements of ncst
questions.answer: Admission requirements at NCST typically include a completed application form, Form 138 (Report Card), Certificate of Good Moral Character, Birth Certificate, and ID photos.

patterns: does ncst have a dress code
questions.answer: Yes, NCST enforces a uniform policy. Students are required to wear prescribed uniforms depending on their program.

patterns: what is the grading system of ncst
questions.answer: NCST uses a standard grading system where 75% is the passing grade. Academic performance is evaluated through quizzes, exams, projects, and class participation.
NCST classes typically run from 7:30 AM to 9:00 PM depending on the program and year level. Some programs also have Saturday classes.
You can contact NCST through their official website, Facebook page, or by calling their trunkline at (046) 123-4567.
The official website of NCST is https://www.ncst.edu.ph/
Yes, NCST maintains an official Facebook page where announcements, schedules, and updates are regularly posted.
